content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-6.5, 3.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position (-9.5, -0.5)), boiler(position (-6.5, 0.0)) and steam engine(position (-6.5, 3.5))

### Crude oil mine at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of pumpjack(position (17.5, 40.5))

### Oil refinery at position(17.5, 45.5)
Consists of pumpjack(position (17.5, 40.5)), oil refinery(position (17.5, 45.5)) and storage tank(position (16.5, 50.5))

### Chemical plant at position(22.5, 54.5)
Consists of chemical plant(position (22.5, 54.5))

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities at occupied or unplaceable positions
- Ensure the target location is clear of other entities and is not part of unplaceable terrain (like water) before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when setting invalid recipes for entities
- Verify that the recipe name is valid and applicable to the entity before setting it.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
